notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the funds of the National Science Foundation of China (grant number 41801311), the Natural Science Foundation of Hunan Province, China (grant number 2018JJ3150), the Philosophy and Social Science Foundation of Hunan Province, China (grant number 18YBQ050), and the Scientific Research Fund of Hunan Provincial Education Department (grant number 19C0777).
